metadata.title: CVE-2024-26949 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/pm: Fix NULL pointer dereference when get power limitBecause powerplay_table initialization is skipped undersriov case, We check and set default lower and upper ODvalue if powerplay_table is NULL.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
